changeSet.author: nikita
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_user ( id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_second_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_mail VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.author: nikita
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_transaction( transaction_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, transaction_sum MEDIUMINT NOT NULL, transaction_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL

changeSet.author: nikita
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_credit( credit_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sum_credit MEDIUMINT NOT NULL, credit_period VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, credit_currency VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL

changeSet.author: nikita
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_cards( card_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, card_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, card_date VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, card_cvv VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (card_id)

changeSet.author: nikita
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_cards( account_id VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, account_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, account_balance MEDIUMINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (account_id)
